## Load Libraries

```{r}
#Check if libraries have to be installed
rm(list=ls()) # remove all variables in the environment
packages <- c("quarto")
install.packages(setdiff(packages, rownames(installed.packages()))) 


# Load required library
library(quarto)
```

```{r}
# List of .qmd files
files <- c("01_load_and_tidy.qmd",
           "02_augment_of_count_data.qmd",
           "03_augment_and_join_of_data_frames.qmd",
           "04_explorative_data_analysis.qmd")

# Render all files
purrr::walk(files, quarto::quarto_render)

```
